default.help_text_portrait: Use the up and down arrows to choose your numbers. Click the question marks (?) to reveal target numbers. If a chosen number matches a target number, position to position, it’s a win! See the prize table for Match 4’s many ways to win.
default.help_text_landscape: Use the up and down arrows to choose your numbers. Click the question marks (?) to reveal target numbers. If a chosen number matches a target number, position to position, it’s a win! See the prize table for Match 4’s many ways to win.
default.landscape_description: Choose your numbers using the arrows or click SHUFFLE.
